release.change: Breaking Change: Tiles and Device Controls: Lock domain will show as active when state is locked to better match Android behavior
Add new location tracking history to troubleshooting section, history items are kept for 48 hours only
Android 14: Add setting to show dashboard in Device Controls instead of tile controls
Bug fixes, design improvements and dependency updates
Breaking Change: Home screen: Lock domain will show as active when state is locked to better match Android behavior
Add Camera Tile with multiple tile support, add the new tile before setting them up in Wear OS app settings
Add smooth scrolling for rotary input
Bug fixes, design improvements and dependency updates
Breaking Change: Driving Interface: Lock domain will show as active when state is locked to better match Android behavior
Add new location tracking history to troubleshooting section, history items are kept for 48 hours only
Bug fixes, design improvements and dependency updates
